message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $18,000. I believe this reflects its true worth.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the product, $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000, which is the maximum I can afford. Let me know if you're open to discussing this.

Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your perspective on the price. While $18,000 represents my initial assessment of the product's value, I'm open to finding a compromise. Would you consider $15,000?  I believe this price point acknowledges the product's worth while making it more attainable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  $15,000 is still a bit higher than I can comfortably spend.  I'm happy to meet you in the middle at $13,500.  Let me know what you think.
